mapper.insert: insert into sims_student (ID, COLLEGE_ID, CLASS_ID, NAME, ID_CARD_NO, ENG_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, GENDER, BIRTH, AVATAR, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, NATION, POLITICAL, MARITAL, DOMICILE_PLACE_PROVINCE, DOMICILE_PLACE_CITY, DOMICILE_PLACE_ADDRESS, HOBBY, INTRO, PRESENT_ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENTRY_DATE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domicilePlaceProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domicilePlaceCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domicilePlaceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sims_student set COLLEGE_ID = #{collegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_NO = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENG_NAME = #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTH = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLITICAL = #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARITAL = #{marital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMICILE_PLACE_PROVINCE = #{domicilePlaceProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMICILE_PLACE_CITY = #{domicilePlaceCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMICILE_PLACE_ADDRESS = #{domicilePlaceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOBBY = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRO = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRESENT_ADDRESS = #{presentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, COLLEGE_ID, CLASS_ID, NAME, ID_CARD_NO, ENG_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, GENDER, BIRTH, AVATAR, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, NATION, POLITICAL, MARITAL, DOMICILE_PLACE_PROVINCE, DOMICILE_PLACE_CITY, DOMICILE_PLACE_ADDRESS, HOBBY, INTRO, PRESENT_ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENTRY_DATE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME from sims_student where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, COLLEGE_ID, CLASS_ID, NAME, ID_CARD_NO, ENG_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, GENDER, BIRTH, AVATAR, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, NATION, POLITICAL, MARITAL, DOMICILE_PLACE_PROVINCE, DOMICILE_PLACE_CITY, DOMICILE_PLACE_ADDRESS, HOBBY, INTRO, PRESENT_ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENTRY_DATE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME from sims_student

select ID, COLLEGE_ID, CLASS_ID, NAME, ID_CARD_NO, ENG_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, GENDER, BIRTH, AVATAR, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, NATION, POLITICAL, MARITAL, DOMICILE_PLACE_PROVINCE, DOMICILE_PLACE_CITY, DOMICILE_PLACE_ADDRESS, HOBBY, INTRO, PRESENT_ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENTRY_DATE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME from sims_student where NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select s.ID, s.COLLEGE_ID, s.CLASS_ID, s.NAME, s.ID_CARD_NO, s.ENG_NAME, s.MOBILE_PHONE, s.GENDER, s.BIRTH, s.AVATAR, c.ID AS CLS_ID, c.NAME AS CLS_NAME from SIMS_STUDENT s, SIMS_CLASS c where s.CLASS_ID = c.ID and s.name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
